attributes.action: Look into and resolve the amount of schooling out children have missed
attributes.additional_details: Our Children have missed so much education and is so unfair. Not only have they missed their educational needs but their mental health has been tested, can't go to school, can't play with their friends, can't have birthday parties, my list could go on.......
attributes.background: We would like to encourage politicians to look into the possibility of our children being allowed to repeat this school year as with all of the restrictions in place and schools being closed. They have lost vital teaching time and we feel it is needed.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

The Government has launched an education recovery package to help young people in England catch up on lost learning due to the pandemic. See:
https://www.gov.uk/government/news/new-education-recovery-package-for-children-and-young-people

You might like to sign the following petition:

All pupils to repeat this current academic year.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566160
